Name: mal-abdulhameedmada-la
Author: Abdul Hameed Madani And Kunhi Mohammed

Translations.Text: avarkk avarute raksitavinkalulla pratiphalam talbhagattu kuti aruvikal olukunna, sthiravasattinulla svargatteappukalakunnu. avaratil nityavasikalayirikkum; ennennekkumayitt‌. allahu avare parri trptippettirikkunnu. avar avane parriyum trptippettirikkunnu. etearuvan tanre raksitavine bhayappettuvea avannullatakunnu at‌
bhumi prakampanam keallikkappettal - atinre bhayankaramaya a prakampanam
atin entuparri enn manusyan parayukayum ceytal
anne divasam at (bhumi) atinre varttamanannal parannariyikkunnatan‌
ninre raksitav atin beadhanam nalkiyat nimittam
anne divasam manusyar pala sanghannalayi purappetunnatan‌. avarkk avarute karm'mannal kanikkappetentatinayitt‌
appeal ar oru anuvinre tukkam nanmaceytirunnuvea avanat kanum
ar oru anuvinre tukkam tinma ceytirunnuvea avan atum kanum
atilute (satru) sanghattinre natuvil pravesiccavayum (kutirakal) tanne satyam
tirccayayum manusyan tanre raksitavineat nandikettavan tanne
ennal avan ariyunnille? khab‌rukalilullat ilakkimaricc puratt keant varappetukayum
